content: The beta is great, especially the responsiveness compared to the old app. Just a minor question - is there a way to turn off dark mode, despite it being my OS setting?
A message was moved here from #Zulip meta > flutter beta by Chris Bobbe.

Thanks for the feedback @Daniel Weber! We don't yet have an independent in-app setting for this, but it's planned. I've noted your request on the issue, https://github.com/zulip/zulip-flutter/issues/1216 , and in the Zulip development community here: https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/channel/48-mobile/topic/dark.20theme.20in-app.20setting/near/2018387
@Daniel Weber an in-app theme setting is now available in today's mobile beta release v0.0.27. Thanks again for the feedback!
